snippet: While Hillary Rodham Clinton was kicking off her very long-awaited presidential bid on one side of the country on Sunday, dozens of deep-pocketed liberal donors were meeting on the other side to ponder a progressive resurgence.
abstract: While Hillary Rodham Clinton was kicking off her very long-awaited presidential bid on one side of the country on Sunday, dozens of deep-pocketed liberal donors were meeting on the other side to ponder a progressive resurgence.

headline.main: Group Spells Out  5-Year Plan to Build Liberal ‘Infrastructure’
